name: Might & Magic Heroes VII: Complete Edition
summary:
The Complete Edition of Might & Magic: Heroes VII is a compilation that includes: 
 
- Might & Magic: Heroes VII (base game) 
- Might & Magic: Heroes VII - Trial By Fire (standalone expansion pack) 
- The Lost Tales of Axeoth (DLC campaigns) 
- Exclusive hero and scenario map 
- Digital soundtrack 
- Heroes of Might & Magic III: HD Edition
